description: vol. 2 (buyūʻ- end). ff. 359. 215 x 160; 172 x 105 mm. 25 lin. Rajab 1240. Commentary on the work of al-Jammāʻīlī completed in Shaʻbān 1167. Incip. (kitāb al-buyūʻ): ... جمع البىع وکانه عبر بالجمع لاختلاف انواعه
author: Saffārīnī, Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad, 1702 or 3-1774
creator: Saffārīnī, Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad, 1702 or 3-1774
subject: Jammāʻīlī, ʻAbd al-Ghanī ibn ʻAbd al-Wāḥid, 1146-1203—ʻUmdat al-aḥkām.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
